name: JMAX Indonesia
description: JMAX global network expands to other countries such as Japan, Malaysia, Thailand, Singapore and Vietnam. The combination of such unique qualities at management level, added with our highly skilled and experienced consultants, make us the right choice for local, Japanese, as well as multinational companies for recruitment consultation.

Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: Staffing and Recruiting
ShortDescription: JMAX Indonesia was founded in May 2013 that aims to become number one HR company in Indonesia by 2020.

Highlights.name: Interpretation
Highlights.description: Our experienced interpreters are ready to assist your business. Most of them has living experiences in the country of their second language. Let us help you with your important meetings and business negotiation.

Highlights.name: Company Establishment
Highlights.description: Planning to enter Indonesia? We can help you setup your company and find your first employeee. Contact us for more details.

Highlights.name: Translation
Highlights.description: Business operation is about spreading message corrrectly across our company. We can assist you translating your precious documents into English, Japanese or Indonesian.

enhanced_description: JMAX Indonesia, founded in May 2013, is a Jakarta-based staffing and recruiting company that provides comprehensive HR consultation services. With a global network spanning Japan, Malaysia, Thailand, Singapore, and Vietnam, JMAX Indonesia specializes in recruitment for local, Japanese, and multinational companies, primarily serving Global and Large Enterprises. Their core services include psychology testing, language services (interpretation and translation for English, Japanese, and Indonesian business communication), and working visa assistance. Additionally, they offer support for foreign companies looking to establish their presence in Indonesia, including initial employee hiring. JMAX Indonesia aims to boost hiring manager confidence and productivity, and help clients hire top talent faster and more efficiently.
key_use_cases: Recruitment consultation for local, Japanese, and multinational companies
Language interpretation for business meetings and negotiations
Assistance with obtaining working visas for employees
Company establishment support for foreign businesses entering Indonesia
Hiring initial employees for new company setups in Indonesia
Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
competitive_advantages: Extensive global network across Japan, Malaysia, Thailand, Singapore, and Vietnam
Highly skilled and experienced consultants and management team
Specialization in recruitment for local, Japanese, and multinational companies
Support for company establishment and initial hiring for foreign market entry in Indonesia
